info.title: AcademicAdvisementAcadProgram
info.description: This service accesses resources in the Academic Programs portion of the AIM System.

put.summary: (CURRENTLY NOT SUPPORTED)Updates the program page with the attributes specified
put.description: (CURRENTLY NOT SUPPORTED)Updates the program page with the attributes specified

200.description: Service request is OK and a response has been generated.

400.description: There appears to be a syntax error in the composition of the service request. The response structure may contain information about the error. If the base URI or service request URI is invalid, any response will come as an HTTP response.

401.description: Bad request - unable to interpret body of the message.

403.description: The user does not have access to the resource.

404.description: The target resource can not be found for the provided resource identifiers.

405.description: The service method is not supported by the service.

409.description: A conflict has occurred. The response structure may contain information about the conflict.

500.description: An error occurred generating the response to the service request. This is strictly a server error and not an application error.
